blogPost.excerpt: How colorful was your Instagram in 2020? Get an interactive report about the most prominent colors you've shared in your posts throughout the year. Discover your personal or brand palette or reconnect with your most colourful experiences. Now on iOS & Android.
blogPost.body: How colorful was your Instagram in 2020? Get an interactive report about the most prominent colors you've shared in your posts throughout the year. Discover your personal or brand palette or reconnect with your most colourful experiences. Now on iOS & Android.
blogPost.title: Year of Colour 2020 - Find out which colours you most used on Instagram this year
blogPost.author: Stef Lewandowski

localize.description: 2020年，你的Instagram有多丰富多彩？获取一份关于你全年在帖子中分享的最突出颜色的互动报告。发现您的个人或品牌调色板，或重新连接您最丰富多彩的体验。现在用的是iOS和Android。
localize.tagline: 找出你今年在Instagram上最常用的颜色

localize.description: 2020年，你的Instagram有多豐富多彩？獲取一份關於你全年在帖子中分享的最突出顏色的互動報告。發現您的個人或品牌調色板，或重新連接您最豐富多彩的體驗。現在用的是iOS和Android。
localize.tagline: 找出你今年在Instagram上最常用的顏色

previous.excerpt: Record Screen or Webcam and Share instantly. No need to install any application. Just super fast recording and share. Live Streaming Feature to be added very soon. Super fast recordings to give feedback to your team, education, creating product demos.
previous.title: Record Webcam + Screen > Share - Simple Screen + Webcam Recording. Share after recording

localize.description: 录制屏幕或网络摄像头，并立即共享。无需安装任何应用程序。只是超快的录制和分享。即将添加直播功能。超快录制，为您的团队、培训、创建产品演示提供反馈。
localize.tagline: 简单的屏幕+网络摄像头录制。录制后共享

localize.description: 錄製屏幕或網絡攝像頭，並立即共享。無需安裝任何應用程序。只是超快的錄製和分享。即將添加直播功能。超快錄製，爲您的團隊、培訓、創建產品演示提供反饋。
localize.tagline: 簡單的屏幕+網絡攝像頭錄製。錄製後共享

next.excerpt: Niceboard is the easiest way to start your own niche job board business, without writing a single line of code. Set up your board in minutes, connect your own domain, view real-time application stats, backfill jobs, translate it, use the private API and more!
next.title: Niceboard 2.0 - Start a job board. No code required.

localize.description: Niceboard是开始你自己的利基职位板业务的最简单的方式，而不需要编写一行代码。在几分钟内设置您的主板，连接您自己的域，查看实时应用程序统计信息，回填作业，翻译它，使用私有API等等！
localize.tagline: 创建一个求职公告板。不需要代码。

localize.description: Niceboard是開始你自己的利基職位板業務的最簡單的方式，而不需要編寫一行代碼。在幾分鐘內設置您的主板，連接您自己的域，查看實時應用程序統計信息，回填作業，翻譯它，使用私有API等等！
localize.tagline: 創建一個求職公告板。不需要代碼。
